title: Thomas Edison National Historical Park: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons       Fall, Winter and Spring Hours September 7 - July 4 Please note the park will be closed New Year's Day.  We will be open on January 2nd and 3rd. Laboratory Wednesday through Sunday, 10:00am - 4:00pm Glenmont Friday, Saturday, and Sunday Glenmont will be closed for the winter - January 11, 2016 - March 17, 2016   Tickets for a house tour are limited and distributed on a first-come first-served basis from the Laboratory Visitor Center starting at 10:00am. A ticketed tour is the only way to enter the house. A car pass to Llewellyn Park must also be obtained at the Laboratory Visitor Center at the same time as the house tour ticket. You will not be able to enter Llewellyn Park and the house without the car pass. The park is closed Thanksgiving, Christmas and New Year's Day.  Â    Summer Hours July 4th -Sept 6th (Labor Day weekend) Laboratory Wednesday through Sunday, 9:30am - 5:00pm Glenmont Wednesday through Sunday, 11:30am - 5:00pm Tickets for a house tour are limited and distributed on a first-come first-served basis from the Laboratory Visitor Center starting at 9:30am. A ticketed tour is the only way to enter the house. A car pass to Llewellyn Park must also be obtained at the Laboratory Visitor Center at the same time as the house tour ticket. You will not be able to enter Llewellyn Park and the house without the car pass.
